definition: to dispel doubts/to clear up difficulties
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
to doubt/to suspect

sentences.english: Books and lectures may have value in answering specific questions and doubts.
sentences.chinese: 书和讲座在解答专门问题与释疑方面可能是有价值的。

sentences.english: Australia no transport to supermarkets and other obligations on camera.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲转运无去各大超市拍照释疑等义务。

sentences.english: Like John, we must give Jesus an opportunity to reply.
sentences.chinese: 像约翰那样，我们必须给耶稣一个释疑的机会。

sentences.english: Besides, I will help you solve problems in learning Chinese if I can.
sentences.chinese: 当然，也乐为“老外”汉语学习释疑解惑。

sentences.english: All parties should encourage Iran to continue to adopt measures conducive to enhancing trust and clarifying doubts.
sentences.chinese: 各方应鼓励伊朗继续采取增信释疑的措施。

sentences.english: But then I thought again and tried to restrain my doubts.
sentences.chinese: 但后来我又想了一想，试图为自己释疑。
